name: RECTRUM
description:
Rectrum. Making lives shorter.

This is Alfa. We'd like to see your suggestions and bug reports at rectrum.game@gmail.com Uptdates every 2 weeks or days or years...

Cheap keyboards may not support a few levels, you can try to change inputs to buttons like "Shift", "Alt", "Ctrl", etc.

Closest goals:

  • Scenario improvements
  • Add subtitles
  • More levels [0.2]
  • Your suggestion

0.10 Changelog:

  • Optimization issues added;
  • Optimization issues fixed;
  • Android support;
  • Simplified 1st level;
  • Changed few UI elements;
  • Changed VHS effect (in  the name of android support);
  • Level 0.1 added.
WHEN FRENCH DIPLOMATE WAS 16 HE SAID THIS TO THE CAESAR "51 62 20 6C 62 68 20 67 75 76 61 78 20 6C 62 68 27 79 79 20 61 72 72 71 20 67 75 76 66 3F 20 4A 72 79 79 2E 20 65 73 64 61 78 20 61 67 69 20 70 64 61 78 62 61 69 3A 20 6B 6C 75 2E 6A 70 75 69 3B 20 6B 6C 75 2E 77 70 77 3B 20 73 65 74 2E 7A 6C 79 64 69 3B 20 66 63 6B 2E 73 75 64" DO YOU KNOW WHY?
